TraitDef.label: Thane of Skyrim
TraitDef.description: This Nord has earned the title of Thane through heroic deeds and service, granted lands and authority by a Jarl. They possess natural leadership abilities and noble bearing.

li.label: Thane
li.description: A recognized noble of Skyrim, this pawn has proven their worth through great deeds and earned the respect of their peers.

TraitDef.label: Jarl of Skyrim
TraitDef.description: This Nord rules one of Skyrim's nine holds, wielding absolute authority over their domain. They possess exceptional leadership skills and political acumen.

li.label: Jarl
li.description: A ruler of one of Skyrim's great holds, this pawn commands respect and loyalty from all who serve under them.

TraitDef.label: High King of Skyrim
TraitDef.description: This Nord has been chosen by the Moot to rule all of Skyrim. They embody the highest ideals of Nordic leadership and possess legendary authority.

li.label: High King
li.description: The supreme ruler of Skyrim, chosen by ancient tradition to lead all the holds and their Jarls.

TraitDef.label: Housecarl
TraitDef.description: This Nord serves as a sworn bodyguard to a Thane, bound by sacred oath to protect their liege with their life. They are elite warriors chosen for absolute loyalty.

li.label: Sworn Sword
li.description: Bound by sacred oath to protect their master, this pawn is an elite warrior of unquestioned loyalty and skill.

TraitDef.label: Stormcloak Rebel
TraitDef.description: This Nord fights in Ulfric Stormcloak's rebellion for Skyrim's independence from the Empire. They are passionate patriots who value freedom above all else.

li.label: True Son of Skyrim
li.description: A rebel fighting for Skyrim's freedom, this pawn embodies the independent spirit of the Nordic people.

TraitDef.label: Nordic Skald
TraitDef.description: This Nord has mastered the ancient tradition of the skalds, serving as a wandering bard, storyteller, and keeper of Nordic cultural memory.

li.label: Master Storyteller
li.description: A keeper of Nordic tradition and lore, this pawn preserves the cultural heritage of Skyrim through song and story.

TraitDef.label: Greybeard
TraitDef.description: This Nord has mastered the Way of the Voice and withdrawn from worldly concerns to meditate on the Thu'um atop High Hrothgar. They possess incredible spiritual power.

li.label: Master of the Voice
li.description: Having achieved mastery over the Thu'um, this pawn has transcended worldly concerns and gained profound spiritual wisdom.

TraitDef.label: Dragonborn
TraitDef.description: This Nord possesses the soul of a dragon and the natural ability to absorb dragon souls and use the Thu'um. A figure of legend walking among mortals.

li.label: Dovahkiin
li.description: Born with the soul of a dragon, this legendary figure can learn and use the Thu'um naturally, a power not seen for generations.
